summary: Part IV of the Dawn Cities.  No DLC required.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/DHCpmWV.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JVTzRTy.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58131/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/baq5z3L.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58288/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/9GknPkF.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58330/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/q3YTEkV.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58598][img]http://i.imgur.com/1CO2UDd.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60708/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/Z3RmaTU.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58275/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/sa4YQJf.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JxjPWxD.png[/img]
[youtube]-fZOmin7zaU[/youtube][youtube]3BEDj8aJe8M[/youtube]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/koY5rDv.png[/img]
[spoiler]
Q: Are there any requirements?
[i]A: Nope! You don't need any DLC and all resources are included!

[/i]Q: Some items are floating / in their vanilla locations instead of the new ones...[i]
A: You installed the mod on an existing save and need to reset the cell using pcb.[/i]

Q: Is this mod compatible with the Civil War (specifically Battle for Solitude)?
[i]A: Yes![/i]

Q: Translations?
[i]A: If you would like to make a translation, please contact me for permission. Current translations are linked by the country flags on the top of the page.[/i]

Q: What other mods are you using in the screenshots?
[i]A: I highly recommend the following mods to be used in conjunction with Dawn of Solitude: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13429/?]Designs of the Nords[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57578/?]Signs of Skyrim[/url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22959/?]Nernie's City and Village Expansion[/url] [/i]

Q: Compatibility?

[b]Compatible:[/b]
All mods that edit Solitude Docks
All mods that edit interior/exterior Proudspire Manor
Nernie's City Expansion / Nernie's Thief Pack / Nernie's Solitude
Sexy Solitude
Solitude Interior Facelift (although there is some conflict in Blue Palace exterior)
Books of Skyrim
Cake o' Clock Hearthfire Bakery
Legacy of the Dragonborn

[b]Incompatible:[/b]
JK's Solitude
Complete Solitude

Full Features List:
- Completely revamped market with three new merchants
- East Empire Company presence within the city
- Sneaky thief alleyways
- Enhancements made all over Castle Dour
- Blue Palace exterior revamped in English garden style
- Redone Bards College exterior and graveyard
- Winking Skeever patio for you to enjoy the temperate Solitude weather
- Plus lots of lanterns, banners, and odds-and-ends!
There is also a special bonus for the discerning thief! Three buildings now have secret entrances, but they won't be easy to find! Hint:([color=#444444]Think Bilbo Baggins![/color]) Let me know what you think of this feature, and if it's popular, I will add it to the other cities as well!
[/spoiler]
[youtube]bf0f_7bZ1Wc[/youtube][youtube]Rf5cmakUp1M[/youtube]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37460/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/a39LExJ.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43701/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/7ZWD7jF.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50336/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/5rabo8J.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58110/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/i2Vd2sQ.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58151/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/gJ5xK1e.png[/img][/url]
[size=5]Permission Notes[/size]
[b]None of my mods or their assets may be redistributed or utilized in other mods in any
circumstance, paid or free.  My mods are exclusive to the nexus and my
tumblr, when applicable.  If you see them elsewhere, including the steam
workshop, they are stolen and I will not condone or support these
versions.

Authorized translations will always be linked in the description and some of these may be hosted on other sites as per my and
the translator's discretion.[/b][/center]
author: BluePianoTwo

files.name: Dawn of Solitude v1.1
files.changelogHtml:
(Released September 16th, 2014)
- Added collision to necessary places
- Minor navmesh edits to resolve Evette San's pathing issues.
- Repacked .bsa with some missing files
